mapper.select:
SELECT M10.MEMO_ID MEMOID , M10.STUS_CODE_ID STUSID , S38.CODE STUSCODE , S38.NAME STUSNAME , M10.MEMO_TITLE MEMOTITLE , M10.MEMO_CNTNT MEMOCNTNT , M10.CRT_USER_ID CRTUSERID , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM SYS0047M WHERE USER_ID = M10.CRT_USER_ID) CRTUSERNM , TO_CHAR(M10.CRT_DT , 'DD/MM/YYYY') CRTDT , TO_CHAR(M10.CRT_DT , 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') FCRTDT , M10.UPD_USER_ID UPDUSERID , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM SYS0047M WHERE USER_ID = M10.UPD_USER_ID) UPDUSERNM , TO_CHAR(M10.UPD_DT , 'DD/MM/YYYY') UPDDT , TO_CHAR(M10.UPD_DT , 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') FUPDDT , M10.IS_STAFF_MEMO STAFFMEMO , M10.IS_CODY_MEMO CODYMEMO , M10.IS_HP_MEMO HPMEMO FROM MSC0010D M10 , SYS0038M S38 WHERE 1 = 1 AND M10.STUS_CODE_ID = S38.STUS_CODE_ID
AND M10.MEMO_TITLE like '%'||#{stitle}||'%'
AND M10.CRT_USER_ID like '%'|| #{screator} || '%'
AND M10.CRT_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{crtsdt}||'000000' , 'DD/MM/YYYYHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(#{crtedt}||'235959' , 'DD/MM/YYYYHH24MISS')
ORDER BY MEMO_ID DESC
mapper.insert: insert into MSC0010D select (select decode(count(1) , 0 , 1 , max(MEMO_ID)+1) from MSC0010D), 1 , #{etitle} , #{hedtor}, decode(nvl(#{staffmemo} , '0') , '0' , 0 , 1), decode(nvl(#{codymemo} , '0') , '0' , 0 , 1), decode(nvl(#{hpmemo} , '0') , '0' , 0 , 1), #{userid} , sysdate ,#{userid} , sysdate from dual
